title: Associate Product Manager Intern
description: Built an end-to-end customer feedback pipeline reducing cycle time by 40% and influence roadmap priorities. Identified customer gaps, and designed RAG analytics dashboard, and led multi-language agent evaluations spanning 30+ languages and $300M in business value.

title: Product Management and Analytics Intern
description: Analyzed web engagement data using SQL/Snowflake to identify conversion drivers, uncovering insights to boost conversions and help acquire 3M+ new accounts. Partnered cross-functionally to improve user experience and streamline credit approvals.

title: Product Manager (Contract)
description: Analyzed 150+ market reports to identify competitive opportunities and shape GTM and product strategy. Built campaign mockups, defined key performance metrics, and gathered customer insights through interviews and market research.

title: Product Manager (Contract)
description: Developed an automated financial modeling database with Python/JavaScript, improving data efficiency by 20%. Developed machine learning tools to track key metrics and forecasting models that improved budget accuracy.

title: Product Manager (Contract)
description: Created a 6-month product roadmap with integrated data pipelines and Figma prototypes for engagement tracking. Led UX ideation and “Power User” definition through interviews with 8K+ users, providing insights for retention efforts.

title: Finance and Analytics Intern
description: Developed a seasonality-based revenue projection model reducing forecast variance to 6%. Automated vendor data aggregation and produced KPI dashboards for executive business reviews, improving reporting efficiency by 15%.
